DBMM Emulator: Boundary Conditions & Gram-Schmidt Reduction

message.content: 你把setup.sh这个文件， 更新到DBMM这个branch里， 然后在切换回当前的branch

content.thinking:
用户想要我把 setup.sh 文件更新到 DBMM 分支，然后切换回当前分支。当前分支是 DBMM-emulator。

我需要：
1. 先确认当前分支（DBMM-emulator）
2. 把 setup.sh 的修改提交或者暂存
3. 切换到 DBMM 分支
4. 把 setup.sh 更新到 DBMM 分支
5. 切换回 DBMM-emulator 分支

让我先看一下 setup.sh 的状态和内容。

content.text: 我来帮你把 setup.sh 更新到 DBMM 分支，然后切换回当前分支。

input.command: git status setup.sh && git diff setup.sh

content.content:
On branch DBMM-emulator
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
	modified:   setup.sh

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")
diff --git a/setup.sh b/setup.sh
index 30a11ca..862735b 100755
--- a/setup.sh
+++ b/setup.sh
@@ -143,7 +143,8 @@ install_openblas_macos() {
     echo_info "Installing OpenBLAS on macOS..."
 
     if ! command -v brew &> /dev/null; then
-        echo_error "Homebrew not found. Please install Homebrew first."
+        echo_error "Homebrew not found. Please install Homebrew first:"
+        echo_error "  /bin/bash -c \"\$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)\""
         exit 1
     fi
 
@@ -156,17 +157,71 @@ install_openblas_macos() {
         OPENBLAS_DIR="/usr/local/opt/openblas"
     fi
 
+    USE_OPENBLAS=true
     echo_info "OpenBLAS installed at: $OPENBLAS_DIR"
 }
 
+# Fix NVIDIA CUDA repository GPG key issue
+fix_nvidia_gpg_key() {
+    echo_info "Fixing NVIDIA CUDA repository GPG key..."
+
+    # Detect Ubuntu version
+    local ubuntu_version=$(lsb_release -rs 2>/dev/null | tr -d '.')
+    if [ -z "$ubuntu_version" ]; then
+        ubuntu_version="2004"  # Default to 20.04
+    fi
+
+    local keyring_url="https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu${ubuntu_version}/x86_64/cuda-keyring_1.1-1_all.deb"
+    local keyring_file="/tmp/cuda-keyring.deb"
+
+    if wget -q -O "$keyring_file" "$keyring_url" 2>/dev/null; then
+        sudo dpkg -i "$keyring_file" 2>/dev/null || true
+        rm -f "$keyring_file"
+        echo_info "NVIDIA GPG key updated"
+        return 0
+    else
+        echo_warn "Could not download NVIDIA keyring, trying alternative fix..."
+        # Alternative: temporarily disable NVIDIA repos
+        sudo mv /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cuda*.list /tmp/ 2>/dev/null || true
+        return 1
+    fi
+}
+
+# Restore NVIDIA repos if they were moved
+restore_nvidia_repos() {
+    if ls /tmp/cuda*.list 1>/dev/null 2>&1; then
+        sudo mv /tmp/cuda*.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ 2>/dev/null || true
+        echo_info "NVIDIA repos restored"
+    fi
+}
+
 # Install OpenBLAS on Linux (Debian/Ubuntu)
 install_openblas_debian() {
     echo_info "Installing OpenBLAS on Debian/Ubuntu..."
 
-    sudo apt-get update
+    # First try apt-get update
+    if ! sudo apt-get update 2>&1 | tee /tmp/apt_update.log | grep -q "NO_PUBKEY\|is no longer signed"; then
+        # Success, proceed with installation
+        :
+    else
+        # Check if it's NVIDIA GPG key issue
+        if grep -q "A4B469963BF863CC\|cuda\|nvidia" /tmp/apt_update.log 2>/dev/null; then
+            echo_warn "NVIDIA CUDA repository GPG key issue detected"
+            fix_nvidia_gpg_key
+            sudo apt-get update || {
+                echo_warn "apt-get update still failing, continuing anyway..."
+            }
+        fi
+    fi
+    rm -f /tmp/apt_update.log
+
     sudo apt-get install -y libopenblas-dev libopenblas-base gfortran
 
+    # Restore NVIDIA repos if they were temporarily moved
+    restore_nvidia_repos
+
     OPENBLAS_DIR="/usr"
+    USE_OPENBLAS=true
     echo_info "OpenBLAS installed"
 }
 
@@ -181,6 +236,7 @@ install_openblas_rhel() {
     fi
 
     OPENBLAS_DIR="/usr"
+    USE_OPENBLAS=true
     echo_info "OpenBLAS installed"
 }
 
@@ -219,12 +275,9 @@ find_openblas() {
             echo_info "OpenBLAS found at: $OPENBLAS_DIR"
             return 0
         fi
-        # Fallback to standard BLAS/LAPACK
+        # Standard BLAS/LAPACK is orders of magnitude slower - do NOT use as fallback
         if ldconfig -p | grep -q "libblas\|liblapack"; then
-            OPENBLAS_DIR="/usr"
-            USE_OPENBLAS=false
-            echo_info "Standard BLAS/LAPACK found (OpenBLAS not available)"
-            return 0
+            echo_warn "Standard BLAS/LAPACK found but is too slow - will install OpenBLAS"
         fi
     fi
 
@@ -440,11 +493,35 @@ verify_installation() {
         ((errors++))
     fi
 
-    # Check OpenBLAS
-    if [ -f "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib/libopenblas.dylib" ] || \
-       [ -f "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib/libopenblas.so" ] || \
-       [ -f "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib64/libopenblas.so" ]; then
-        echo_info "OpenBLAS: found at ${OPENBLAS_DIR}"
+    # Check OpenBLAS (check multiple possible locations)
+    local openblas_found=false
+    local openblas_location=""
+
+    # Check standard locations
+    for check_path in \
+        "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib/libopenblas.dylib" \
+        "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib/libopenblas.so" \
+        "${OPENBLAS_DIR}/lib64/libopenblas.so" \
+        "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopenblas.so" \
+        "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openblas-pthread/libopenblas.so" \
+        "/usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libopenblas.so"; do
+        if [ -f "$check_path" ]; then
+            openblas_found=true
+            openblas_location="$check_path"
+            break
+        fi
+    done
+
+    # Also check via ldconfig
+    if ! $openblas_found && command -v ldconfig &> /dev/null; then
+        if ldconfig -p | grep -q libopenblas; then
+            openblas_found=true
+            openblas_location=$(ldconfig -p | grep "libopenblas.so " | head -1 | awk '{print $NF}')
+        fi
+    fi
+
+    if $openblas_found; then
+        echo_info "OpenBLAS: found at ${openblas_location}"
     else
         echo_warn "OpenBLAS library not found at expected location"
     fi

content.thinking:
好的，我可以看到 setup.sh 有很多修改。现在我需要：
1. 切换到 DBMM 分支
2. 将 setup.sh 的修改应用到那个分支
3. 提交修改
4. 切换回 DBMM-emulator 分支

但是，我需要先暂存当前的修改，或者用其他方式把修改带过去。最简单的方式是用 git stash 或者 git checkout --patch。

让我用 git stash 的方式来处理：
1. git stash push setup.sh
2. git checkout DBMM
3. git stash pop
4. git add setup.sh && git commit
5. git checkout DBMM-emulator
6. 恢复 setup.sh 的修改

或者更简单的方式是用 git show 来获取当前文件内容，然后在 DBMM 分支上应用。

content.text: 完成。`setup.sh` 已经提交到 DBMM 分支（commit b69dd6b），现在已切换回 DBMM-emulator 分支。
